title: Fix Promo loss on remake BUG
body:
First off, I'm NOT Diamond. I was NOT AFK. Situation is a s follows:

1. Got in promos (got a free win)
2. Second game, our top laner didn't connect, and we vote to remake.
3. I lost my next game in series
4. I lose series without getting a thirdt game.

According to this remake stuff, my remake should not have gone against me. This isn't a discussion on what I did wrong. This is to tell RIOT they have once again f!#@! me. That is all.

Skaggs

replies.body: Remaking at that rank shouldn't count as a loss, so I looked into this to see what happened.  It looks like you had a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) followed by a loss.  Dodging counts as a loss, so this resulted in ending the series.  You're still pretty close to getting into another series, though.  Let me know if that clears things up, and good luck!
